tool_description: YouTube Script Writer is a powerful API that generates high-quality scripts for YouTube videos on any topic using OpenAI's ChatGPT 3 language model. With this API, you can easily create engaging and informative scripts for your YouTube videos without spending hours brainstorming ideas or writing content.  The API offers three endpoints that generate 500, 1000, and 2000 words scripts respectively. Simply provide the topic of your video as input, and the API will generate a script that meets yo...
title: Youtube Script Writer - Chat GPT-3
